Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the sale, use and application of styrene and products containing styrene by appearance enhancement businesses
Summary: Prohibits the sale, use and application of styrene and products containing styrene by appearance enhancement businesses.
LawCode: Add ยง404-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale, use and application of styrene and products containing styrene by appearance enhancement businesses
